# The `MCAOperand` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

A representation of an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/instruction">mca::Instruction</a> operand for use in <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/custombehaviour">mca::CustomBehaviour</a>.
